item.title: Butterfly
item.description: Â It was late one summer evening when I saw that butterfly On its wings were every colour you could find Â And I held it for a moment then I let if fly away Soon it disappeared and left me far behind Â And in my imagination I was floating on the breeze Drifting over every mountain, sea and land Â And with no one there to stop me Every dream was coming true People walking side by side, and hand in hand Â Butterfly, butterfly, butterfly Spread your wings, like a bird, flying high Set your sail, ride the wind take the news around the world Bringing love and happiness eternally Â Butterfly, butterfly, butterfly Fly away, like a star in the sky Carry hope, carry faith into every lonely heart Teach the world to live in peace and harmony Â In a dream I saw it flying to a far and distant shore Where the people stood and watched it with a smile Â Soon the quarreling was over There was peace throughout the land Making all the days of traveling seem worthwhile Â There were tulip fields in Holland And the roses in Versailles And the English country garden in the sun Â Edelweiss and bright red poppies Lovely blue forget-me-nots Growing tall and proud, and shared by everyone Â Butterfly, butterfly, butterfly Spread your wings, like a bird, flying high Set your sail, ride the wind take the news around the world Bringing love and happiness eternally Â Butterfly, butterfly, butterfly Fly away, like a star in the sky Carry hope, carry faith into every lonely heart Teach the world to live in peace and harmony Â Now and then there is danger all around Thunder strikes and lightning hits the ground But my friend shakes his wings and carries on Through the rain to the sun Â Butterfly, butterfly, butterfly Spread your wings, like a bird, flying high Set your sail, ride the wind take the news around the world Bringing love and happiness eternally Â Butterfly, butterfly, butterfly Fly away, like a star in the sky Carry hope, carry faith into every lonely heart Teach the world to live in peace and harmony Â And I wish that I could be up there with you and fly so free in the sky, butterfly butterfly

item.title: Emperorâ€™s New Clothes
item.description: Â (Finders keepers, losers weepers) Â Welcome to the end of eras Ice has melted back to life Done my time and served my sentence Dress me up and watch me die Â If it feels good, tastes good It must be mine Dynasty decapitated You just might see a ghost tonight Â And if you don’t know now you know Â I’m taking back the crown I’m all dressed up and naked I see what’s mine and take it (Finders keepers, losers weepers) Oh yeah Â The crown So close I can taste it I see what’s mine and take it (Finders keepers, losers weepers) Oh yeah Â Sycophants on velvet sofas Lavish mansions, vintage wine I am so much more than royal Snatch your chain and mace your eyes Â If it feels good, tastes good It must be mine Heroes always get remembered But you know legends never die Â And if you don’t know now you know Â I’m taking back the crown I’m all dressed up and naked I see what’s mine and take it (Finders keepers, losers weepers) Oh yeah Â The crown So close I can taste it I see what’s mine and take it (Finders keepers, losers weepers) Oh yeah Â Mortal kings are ruling castles Welcome to my world of fun Liars settle into sockets Flip the switch and watch them run Â Oh yeah (Finders keepers, losers weepers) Â I’m taking back, back, taking back, back the crown I’m all dressed up and naked I see what’s mine and take it (Finders keepers, losers weepers) Oh yeah Â The crown So close I can taste it I see what’s mine and take it (Finders keepers, losers weepers) Oh yeah Â (Finders keepers, losers weepers) (Finders keepers, losers weepers)

item.title: Regenerate
item.description: Regenerate, regenerate this life Regenerate, regenerate, we’ve returned to reclaim Â I miss the stable ground We’re waiting faces down In a world that’s sinking I think this world and the stars Aren’t in each other’s arms In this world that’s sinking Â Stop living for yourself You’re just living in your own hell Â To bring this back to a proper course We will band together, stand together To bring this back to a place I know We will band together, we will regroup Â Hear the voice inside you Use the truth to guide you, now This is our time to restore the faith Regenerate, we will be the change Â We’re searching for a cure ‘Cause our world is drowning We’re quick to guard our hearts Forget we share our scars In this world that’s drowning Â Stop living for yourself You’re just living in your own hell Â To bring this back to a proper course We will band together, stand together To bring this back to a place I know We will band together, we will regroup Â Hear the voice inside you Use the truth to guide you, now This is our time to restore the faith Regenerate, we will be the change Â Why condemn when you can confide?

item.description: Â You want someone to blame The one who drives the rusted nail But who’s left will never care Pretending becomes a chore All you search for, a little piece of mind Too far, too deep, the two faced smile So lost, you feel, I know Â Wide awake but still asleep Always a stranger in a crowd (Sleep, sleep, sleep) Wide awake, always a stranger in a crowd (Wake, wake, wake) Â Just this once Listen to the words I say If you want I will I’m there until the end of time Â Leave the doomed behind Search with different light You were trying to remember But it’s all make believe Â You are, you are, you are Â Wide awake but still asleep (Wide awake but still asleep) Always a stranger in a crowd Â Just this once Listen to the words I say If you want I will I’m there until the end of time Â Just this once Listen to the words I say If you want, I’m there Â Just this once Listen to the words I say If you want I will I’m there until the end of time

item.title: Sultans Of Swing
item.description: Â You get a shiver in the dark It’s raining in the park but meantime South of the river you stop and you hold everything A band is blowing Dixie double four time You feel alright when you hear that music ring Â Well now you step inside but you don’t see too many faces Coming in out of the rain to hear the jazz go down Competition in other places Ah but the horns, they blowing that sound Way on down south, way on down south, London town Â You check out Guitar George, he knows all the chords Mind, he’s strictly rhythm, he doesn’t want to make it cry or sing Yes, and an old guitar is all he can afford When he gets up under the lights to play his thing Â And Harry doesn’t mind if he doesn’t make the scene He’s got a daytime job, he’s doing alright He can play the honky tonk like anything Saving it up for Friday night With the Sultans, with the Sultans of Swing Â And a crowd of young boys, they’re fooling around in the corner Drunk and dressed in their best brown baggies and their platform soles They don’t give a damn about any trumpet playing band It ain’t what they call rock and roll Then the Sultans, yeah, the Sultans they play Creole Creole Â And then the man, he steps right up to the microphone And says at last, just as the time bell rings “Goodnight, now it’s time to go home” Then he makes it fast with one more thing “We are the Sultans, we are the Sultans of Swing”
